Class UnitPriceConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • UnitPriceConverter

  • public class UnitPriceConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    The class UnitPriceConverter calculates the price per pound and of ounces given an input of the price and weight of an item.
    Version:
    17 Feb 2019
    Author:
    Austin Lowery

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnitPriceConverter()
      The no-args constructor sets the values of the price and weight fields to zero
      UnitPriceConverter(double price, double weight)
      This constructor takes in a price and weight then calls the private calculatePricePerWeight method for calculating the price per pound and ounce

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getPrice()
      The method getPrice is a get method returning the priceOfItem
      double getPricePerOunce()
      The method getPricePerOunce is a get method returning the pricePerOunce
      double getPricePerPound()
      The method getPricePerPound is a get method returning the pricePerPound
      double getWeight()
      The method getWeight is a get method returning the weightInPound
      void setPrice(double price)
      The setPrice method stores the parameter, price, to priceOfItem
      The price per pound and ounce are also recalculated
      void setWeight(double weight)
      The setWeight method stores the parameter, weight, to weightInPound
      The price per pound and ounce are also recalculated

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnitPriceConverter

        public UnitPriceConverter()
        The no-args constructor sets the values of the price and weight fields to zero

      • UnitPriceConverter

        public UnitPriceConverter(double price,
                          double weight)
        This constructor takes in a price and weight then calls the private calculatePricePerWeight method for calculating the price per pound and ounce
        Parameters:
        price - the cost of an item for weightInPounds pounds of that item
        weight - the weight of the item

    • Method Detail

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        The method getPrice is a get method returning the priceOfItem
        Returns:
        priceOfItem - the cost of an item for weightInPounds pounds of that item

      • getPricePerOunce

        public double getPricePerOunce()
        The method getPricePerOunce is a get method returning the pricePerOunce
        Returns:
        pricePerOunce - the cost of an item for each ounce

      • getPricePerPound

        public double getPricePerPound()
        The method getPricePerPound is a get method returning the pricePerPound
        Returns:
        pricePerPound - the cost of an item for each pound

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        The method getWeight is a get method returning the weightInPound
        Returns:
        weightInPound - the weight of an item

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(double price)
        The setPrice method stores the parameter, price, to priceOfItem
        The price per pound and ounce are also recalculated
        Parameters:
        price - the new cost of the item for weightInPound pounds of that item

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(double weight)
        The setWeight method stores the parameter, weight, to weightInPound
        The price per pound and ounce are also recalculated
        Parameters:
        weight - the new weight of the item
